issue.title: [CF 1619] Add option to Combat Event type to only process events if icon's conditions are passing
issue.body:
From https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/tellmewhen/issues/1618 

 

Add an option to the combat event icon type to only process events if the icon's conditions are passing. Then you could put your bladestorm condition on the icon itself instead of as a destination condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #1619 | Raw
